Constructor Detail

Localization

public Localization(Odometer odo,
                    UltrasonicSensor us,
                    Navigation navi,
                    ColorSensor colsens)
Constructor

Parameters:
odo - The shared Odometer
us - Ultrasonic sensor used for ultrasonic localization
navi - Main navigation class to turn and drive to origin
colsens - Color sensor used for light localization
Method Detail

doLocalization

public void doLocalization()
Performs rising or falling edge ultrasonic localization depending on if the sensor initially reads a wall.

doLightLocalization

public void doLightLocalization()
Performs light localization around a grid intersection. Method assumes robot is close to an intersection

wallInSight

public boolean wallInSight()
Checks if the ultrasonic sensor reads a wall less than a set distance

Returns:
True if the ultrasonic sensor reading is less than than the clipping distance

spinLeft

public void spinLeft()
Spin the robot left, will spin until stopped.

spinRight

public void spinRight()
Spin the robot right, will wpin until stopped.
